attributes.action: Increase the safety of our citizens by ensuring all those thought by judges to deserve prison GO to prison.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If needs be, send the recently reported prison inmates, who are known to be awaiting deportation, back to where they came from. Anyone who is awaiting asylum decisions who commits a crime goes straight back to where he/she came from - not to prison.
Why should the UK tax payer fork out hard-earned money in these cases?
In doing these things, we would create places in existing prisons, for our own prisoners.
